actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 715 of title 32 of the United States Code to provide that claims for damage or injury caused by members of the Army or Air National Guard shall be allowed under such section notwithstanding the availability of remedies against the States for such damage or injury.

summary.text: Provides that claims for damage or injury caused by members of the Army or Air National Guard shall be allowed notwithstanding the availability of remedies against the States for such damage or injury. (Adds 32 U.S.C. 715(i))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 715 of title 32 of the United States Code to provide that claims for damage or injury caused by members of the Army or Air National Guard shall be allowed under such section notwithstanding the availability of remedies against the States for such damage or injury.
